overview: A beautiful female doctor visits her small hometown on her way back to Chicago. Her overworked uncle, who is the town's doctor, wants her to stay and help him, and he and a macho test pilot who's fallen for her come up with a plan that involves the pilot faking an illness and being treated by her, with her uncle's "help".
tagline: When Beautiful Doctor Meets Handsome Hospital Case.. IT'S TOUCH AND OH!
title: Her Favorite Patient
